## Distribution par Mode

```{r}
data %>%
  count(Mode, sort = TRUE) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(Mode, -n), y = n, fill = Mode)) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Nombre") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
